conbody.p: Topicreftopicref, or topic reference topic reference, is a reference from within a map to an external topic, DITA document or non-DITA document.

Topicrefs are characterized by the following:
Target location
Topicrefs can link to:
External topics
DITA documents
Non-DITA documents
Attributes
The collection-type attribute describes how topicrefs relate to each other: choice, family, sequence, unordered.
Views of topicref
Topicrefs can be displayed two ways: either unresolved (as links) or as resolved content of referenced documents. For more information, see .
Unresolved and resolved views of topicrefs in Serna.
